text: @WHO @WHO_Europe @WHOEMRO @WHOAFRO @WHOSEARO @WHOWPRO @pahowho Masks are ineffective after 15 min or if they get moisture in them. WHO doesn't have a clue. They are just a corrupt organisation like the UN.
